plum.util module¶

plum.util.multihash(*args)[source]¶

Multi-argument order-sensitive hash.

Parameters

*args – Objects to hash.

Returns

Hash.

Return type

int

class plum.util.Comparable[source]¶

Bases: object

A mixin that makes instances of the class comparable.

Requires the subclass to just implement __le__.

is_comparable(other)[source]¶

Check whether this object is comparable with another one.

Parameters

other (util.Comparable) – Object to check comparability with.

Returns

True if the object is comparable with other and False

otherwise.

Return type

bool

plum.util.get_default(dictionary, key, default)[source]¶

Get a value from a dictionary, assuming a default value.

Parameters

  • dictionary (dict) – Dictionary.

  • key (hashable) – Key of value to get.

  • default (object) – Default value, in case the key is not in the dictionary.

Returns

Value associated to key or the default value.

Return type

object
